instructions: Walk to the other end of the lobby and wait near the exit.
Walk straight toward the bar with the chairs/stool. Turn left and go straight until you get to three tables with chairs. Turn left and wait near the couch.
Go forward toward the windows. Go toward the the far couch, Stop next to the couch, in front of the windows.
instructions_minimal: Walk to the end of the lobby and wait near the exit.
Walk straight, then turn left. Continue straight to the tables, then turn left and wait.
Go forward. Stop next to the couch.
instructions_goal_only: Stop in front of the windows.

instructions: turn right and go up the stairs and stand at the top.
Walk up the stairs and wait at the top.
Go up the stairs. Stop at the top of the stairs.
instructions_minimal: Turn right, go up the stairs, and stand at the top.
Go up the stairs and wait at the top.
Go upstairs. Stop at the top.
instructions_goal_only: Stand at the top of the stairs.
Wait at the top of the stairs.
Reach the top of the stairs.

instructions: Turn, putting the exit of the building  on your left. Walk to the end of the entrance way and turn left. Travel across the kitchen area with the counter and chairs on your right. Continue straight until you reach the dining room. Enter the room and stop and wait one meter from the closest end of the long dining table.

Go down hallway towards the two white vases. When you have a staircase towards your right, turn left towards the dining room. Go past bar lined with chairs and wait in front of the long dining room table.
Walk past the two urns and turn left. Walk to the entrance of the dining room, straight ahead, and stop under the arch.
instructions_minimal: Exit the building with the exit on your left. Walk to the end and turn left. Walk across the kitchen with the counter on your right. Continue straight to the dining room. Enter and stop one meter from the table.
Proceed down the hallway. When you reach a staircase on your right, turn left towards the dining room. Go past the bar and wait in front of the dining room table.
Walk forward and turn left. Continue straight to the entrance of the dining room and stop.
instructions_goal_only: Wait one meter from the closest end of the long dining table.
Wait in front of the long dining room table.

instructions: Walk past the piano to the oval door opening, walk straight ahead to the bathtub, stop right in front of bathtub.
Walk past piano. Walk through arched wooden doors. Wait at bathtub.
Turn left and walk across the hallway. Turn left again and walk across this hallway and wait by the bathtub.
instructions_minimal: Walk to the door, go straight to the bathtub, and stop.
Proceed forward. Go through the doors. Wait at the bathtub.
Turn left, walk across the hallway. Turn left again, walk across the hallway, and wait.
instructions_goal_only: Stand in front of the bathtub.

instructions: go straight to the door then turn right.
Walk past the shelves and out of the garage. Stop in front of the opening to the wine cellar.

With the storage lockers to your right, exit the garage via the door that's ahead of you and against the right hand wall. After exiting the garage, turn right ninety degrees and move forward until arched doorway is to your immediate right.
instructions_minimal: Go straight, then turn right.
Walk out of the garage. Stop in front of the wine cellar.
Exit the garage through the door ahead on the right. Turn right and move forward until the arched doorway is on your right.
instructions_goal_only: Stand in front of the wine cellar.

instructions: Exit the bedroom. Turn left continue down the hallway until you get to the stairs. Wait there.
Walk into the hallway and turn left. Walk to the left of the railing and across the hall past the plant. Stop to the left of the stairs.
Exit the room and turn left.  Stop just before you reach the stairs that go up.
instructions_minimal: Exit the bedroom. Turn left and continue down the hallway to the stairs. Wait there.
Enter the hallway and turn left. Walk across the hall and stop to the left of the stairs.
Exit the room and turn left. Stop before the stairs.
instructions_goal_only: Stop to the left of the stairs.

instructions: Turn right and walk towards the refrigerator. Go up the stairs to the left of the refrigerator, past the banister. Turn right, then turn right again. Head up those stairs.
Make a left and go up the stairs. Walk straight into the hall. Make a left and go up to the third brown step.
Go straight passing the fridge and up the the small set of stairs. Turn right and go up 3 stairs on the next staircase and wait.
instructions_minimal: Turn right and walk forward. Go up the stairs to the left. Turn right, then turn right again. Head up those stairs.
Make a left and go up the stairs. Walk straight into the hall. Make a left and go up three steps.
Go straight, up the small set of stairs. Turn right, go up 3 stairs, and wait.
instructions_goal_only: Go to the top of the stairs.
Go to the third brown step.
Wait at the top of the stairs.

instructions: Face the walkway with a kitchen counter with bar stools on the right and large windows on the other side and walk past them towards a large dining table  Turn to the sitting area and stop.
Walk straight past the kitchen area and bar stools until you reach a formal dining table.  Walk into the room with the sofa on the right and stop by the glass table.
Walk through the kitchen, enter the dining room, walk to the doorway to the right of the dining room table, wait at the glass table.
instructions_minimal: Walk past the kitchen counter and windows towards the dining table. Turn to the sitting area and stop.
Walk straight until you reach a table. Enter the room on the right and stop by the table.
Walk through the kitchen, enter the dining room, go to the doorway to the right, and wait at the table.
instructions_goal_only: Go to the sitting area and stop.

instructions: Turn to your left and enter the sitting room. Once in, turn right and walk past the dining room table. Stop in the doorway on the other side, looking into the kitchen.
Turn right and go straight past the table and chairs. Wait at the kitchen entrance.
Go past pug and chair into next room. Go straight past table and stop at doorway.
instructions_minimal: Turn left into the sitting room. Turn right and walk past the dining room table to the doorway leading into the kitchen.
Turn right and go straight. Wait at the entrance.
Go into the next room. Go straight and stop at the doorway.

instructions: Go up all the stairs and stop on the rug at the top.
Go up the stairs and stop at the top near the mirror.
Go up the stairs. At the top of the stairs step on the rug. Stop on the rug close to the window on the right.
instructions_minimal: Go up all the stairs and stop at the top.
Go up the stairs and stop at the top.
Go up the stairs. At the top, stop.
instructions_goal_only: Stop on the rug at the top.
Stop on the rug by the window.

instructions: Walk out of the closet and into the hallway. Walk through the hallway entrance on the left.Stop just inside the entryway.
Exit the closet into the hall way. Enter the doorway to the nearest left. Enter the bedroom. Wait there.

Turn to your left and exit the room out of the door beside the wooden drawers. Once out of the room walk across the small area and through the next entry way on the left. Stop inside the room before you get to the doors leading outside.
instructions_minimal: Exit the closet into the hallway. Enter the hallway on the left and stop inside.
Exit the closet into the hallway. Enter the first door on the left. Enter the bedroom. Wait there.
Turn left and exit the room. Walk across and go through the entryway on the left. Stop inside the room before the doors leading outside.
instructions_goal_only: Stop inside the room before the doors leading outside.

instructions: Turn right and enter through the sliding door. Continue past the TV on the right. Enter the kitchen and wait beside the fridge.

Go toward the white table on the patio.  Turn right and go inside through the sliding doors.  Go through the room with television and into the kitchen.  Stop nest to the stove and island in the kitchen.
Walk toward the white patio table and chairs and go into the house through the glass sliding doors. Pass the grey couches and go into the kitchen. Wait by the toaster.
instructions_minimal: Turn right and enter through the door. Continue forward. Enter the kitchen and wait.
Head to the patio. Turn right and go inside through the sliding doors. Go through the room into the kitchen. Stop next to the stove and island.
Walk inside through the sliding doors. Pass the couches and go into the kitchen. Wait by the toaster.
instructions_goal_only: Stop next to the stove in the kitchen.

instructions: Take a left and take a right at the doll hutch. Walk into the bedroom and take a left. Walk into the bathroom and wait in front of the sink.
Walk forward to the curio cabinet and turn right. Enter the bedroom and walk to the foot of the bed. Turn to the left and walk past the leather chair and through the doorway. Wait near the sink.
Walk down the hall leading to the cabinet. At the cabinet take a right and enter the bedroom. In the room take a left and enter the bathroom on the far left. Stop on the rug in front of the sink.
instructions_minimal: Turn left, then right. Enter the bedroom and turn left. Walk into the bathroom and wait by the sink.
Walk forward and turn right. Enter the bedroom and walk to the foot of the bed. Turn left and walk through the doorway. Wait near the sink.
Walk down the hall. Take a right into the bedroom. Take a left into the bathroom. Stop in front of the sink.
instructions_goal_only: Wait in front of the sink.
Go to the rug in front of the sink in the bathroom.

instructions: Exit bathroom into bedroom. Exit bedroom into hallway. and stop by stairs.
Walk past the towel rack on the right. Exit the bathroom, and walk through the closet. Make a left at the bed, and walk to the open bedroom door. Wait at the top of the stairs.
Leave the shower and turn left. Exit the bathroom and go through the closet to the bedroom. Turn left and and go to   the door. Turn left and exit the bedroom. Wait at the top of the stairs.
instructions_minimal: Exit bathroom, go to bedroom. Exit bedroom, go to hallway, stop by stairs.
Exit the bathroom, walk through the closet. Turn left at the bed and go to the bedroom door. Wait at the top of the stairs.
Exit the shower and turn left. Go through the closet to the bedroom. Turn left and go to the door. Turn left and exit the bedroom. Wait at the top of the stairs.
instructions_goal_only: Wait at the top of the stairs.
Wait at the top of the stairs.

instructions: Exit the closet. Walk past the drapery on the right. Wait at the threshold of the bedroom door.
Exit the room through the door on the right. Walk forward through the bedroom and wait in the doorway.
Leave the closet, and walk out of the bedroom. Stop once you exit the bedroom door.
instructions_minimal: Exit the closet. Walk past the right side. Stop at the bedroom door.
Exit the room through the door on the right. Walk forward and wait in the doorway.
Exit the closet and leave the bedroom. Stop outside the bedroom door.
instructions_goal_only: Wait at the threshold of the bedroom door.
